Judul: PERANCANGAN READY TO WEAR YANG DIADAPTASI DARI VISUAL ANXIETY
Abstrak:
This work aims to describe and interpret the visuals of anxiety felt by sufferers, and make it into a
new form. This work focuses on the application of the ERP (Exposure Response Prevention)
method, or Exposure Prevention and Prevention Therapy which exposes itself to the source of
repetitive fear, without making any compulsion to neutralize or stop the fear, visually applied to
ready to wear clothing so that visual initially disturbing, can be accepted as a form of therapy for
sufferers. The purpose of making this work is as a form of awareness anxiety and therapy for the
fans.
